Sure, here are simplified versions of the abilities for the 6 creature races:

1. Snatchers: These creatures have an active ability to steal a fruit card from another player.
2. Munchies: These creatures have a passive ability that lets them collect extra fruit cards when they collect fruit.
3. Shapeshifters: These creatures have an active ability to swap their fruit cards with those of another player.
4. Collectors: These creatures have a passive ability that lets them pick up an extra fruit card whenever they collect fruit.
5. Protectors: These creatures have a passive ability that adds an extra layer of protection to their fruit cards, making it harder for other players to steal their fruits.
6. Conjurers: These creatures have an active ability to draw a mystery fruit card from the deck, potentially giving them an advantage in the game.

These simplified abilities keep the core elements of the game intact, and make it easier for players to understand and use their creature abilities.
